## Team 2


'''bash
: Create environment: 
Conda create --name "Team3" python=3.8
:Use environment
Conda activate Team3
'''

Create a folder of your choice for the files

run
git clone https://github.com/eeroolli/RossmannCompetitionTEAM3.git

go the new created folder:
run python data.py
